name: Ant Hero Run
description:
The ants need another hero to serch for save way to go back to home. This days Ants heros dies like flies, I wonder why.

It is my humble project, made in unity for WOWIE JAM 3. I had so much plans for it but I end up doing bare minimum(like 30% of what i planned), but it is playable.  

I had more problems in development that i thought , but it was nice experience. 

ps: If Jonas read this, thanks for being awesome
